thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Samsung Elec Q4 profit up 64 pct on-year to new record

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Samsung Elec Q4 profit up 64 pct on-year to new record
text:
SEOUL, Jan 31 (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics Co Ltd posted a record quarterly profit, as expected, for the three months through December, led by strong demand for memory chips.
Operating profit for the worldâ€™s biggest chipmaker was 15.15 trillion won ($14.12 billion) in the fourth quarter, up 64.3 percent from a year ago and in line with the 15.1 trillion won the company had estimated.
Revenue jumped 23.7 percent to 66 trillion won, also in line with its earlier estimate. ($1 = 1,072.6500 won) (Reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Stephen Coates)
